name: example
description: Delete me! This is just an example.

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.preview: npm pack --dry-run && echo "==============================" && echo "This report shows what will be published to the module registry. Pay attention to the tarball contents and assure no sensitive files will be published."
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.reset: echo Resetting test environments && cd ./test && npm run clean && cd ../build && npm run clean
scripts.setup: echo "Installing build and test dependencies..." && node -e "let fs=require('fs');let path=require('path');fs.mkdirSync(path.resolve('node_modules'));fs.symlinkSync(path.resolve('./node_modules'), path.resolve('./build/node_modules'));fs.symlinkSync(path.resolve('./node_modules'), path.resolve('./test/node_modules'));" && cd ./build && npm i --no-package-lock && cd ../test && npm i --no-package-lock && echo Template Setup Complete.
scripts.resetup: node -e "let fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');fs.unlinkSync(path.resolve('./build/node_modules'));fs.unlinkSync(path.resolve('./test/node_modules'));fs.rmdirSync(path.resolve('./node_modules'), { recursive: true });" && npm run setup
